name: Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner
how_to_use: Use ideally in the PM, no more frequently than once per day. After cleaning, saturate a cotton pad with the formula and sweep across face and neck. Avoid the eye contour and contact with eyes. Do not rinse off. Continue with additional skin treatments as needed.
conflicts: do not use with other direct acids in the same routine
warnings: this AHA increases sun sensitivity, use sunscreen and limit sun exposure during use and for one week afterwards

name: Saccharomyces Ferment 30% Milky Toner
how_to_use: Use after cleansing to help even skin texture and provide enhanced surface hydration. Dispense onto the palms of your hands or a cotton pad, and gently sweep across the face. It can be used daily as part of your skincare regimen. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.

name: AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution
benefits: exfoliates multiple layers of the skin
how_to_use: Use ideally in the PM, no more frequently than twice per week. Clean face and wait for skin to dry. Apply evenly across face and neck using fingertips, avoiding the eye area. Leave on for no more than 10 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Avoid the eye contour and contact with eyes. This low-viscosity solution is intended to be used as a mask. Do not leave on for longer than 10 minutes.
conflicts: do not use on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin
warnings: this AHA increases sun sensitivity, use sunscreen and limit sun exposure during use and for one week afterwards

name: Lactic Acid 10% + HA
how_to_use: Apply once per day, ideally in the PM. Can be diluted with other treatments to reduce strength until skin develops tolerance. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. (Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skins sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.)
conflicts: do not use on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin
warnings: this AHA increases sun sensitivity, use sunscreen and limit sun exposure during use and for one week afterwards

name: PHA 5% Exfoliating Lip Serum
how_to_use: Apply a thin layer to clean, dry lips in the AM and PM. Do not rinse off after application. Can be used before applying other lip products.

name: Salicylic Acid 2% Solution
how_to_use: Use in the AM and PM. Apply a small dot directly on spots for visible improvement or apply a small amount over the face for general use.

name: Azelaic Acid Suspension 10%
how_to_use: Apply to the face in the AM and/or PM to improve visible brightness and even skin texture. Avoid contact with eyes and mouth.

name: Salicylic Acid 2% Anhydrous Solution
how_to_use: Apply a small dot directly on spots for visible improvement or apply a small amount over the face for general use.

name: Lactic Acid 5% + HA
how_to_use: Apply once per day, ideally in the PM. Can be diluted with other treatments to reduce strength until skin develops tolerance. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. (Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skins sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.)
conflicts: do not use on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin
warnings: this AHA increases sun sensitivity, use sunscreen and limit sun exposure during use and for one week afterwards
